t:
"My dear husband, Ajaan is a vegetarian and doesn't drink. I am his only friend and I'm leaving today. I cannot explain why, but since my illness I have been feeling bad about myself and lost my appetite. Please let him and me live together. I'll write about what I've seen on the trip and why the only place I can enjoy being with him is this place.
"Sincerely,
Your unloving wife"
c:
#humanAIcollaboration: In the human-AI collaboration, I take a prompt and feed it through an AI. The AI writes the story and I add the final touches to make it more presentable and understandable. These stories might not make sense but just know that a computer wrote these.



#wife #leave #extramaritalaffairs #friendship
Collab and complete this #shortstory prompt. Feel free to write in any language and as many words. #theletterstory  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba
